member.name: D3D12_TEX1D_ARRAY_UAV
member.summary: Describes an array of unordered-access 1D texture resources.

member.name: D3D12_TEX1D_ARRAY_UAV.FirstArraySlice
member.summary: The zero-based index of the first array slice to be accessed.

member.name: D3D12_TEX1D_ARRAY_UAV.ArraySize
member.summary: The number of slices in the array.
